entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
